ModMetaData.name: 4M Mehni's Misc Modifications [1.2-1.3]
ModMetaData.author: Mehni, XeoNovaDan, Miyuri (ZXfkSIE)
ModMetaData.description:
Adds various settings to customise your RimWorld experience. Check the description page on Steam Workshop for more details. 

v1.3.0.0 Upgraded for RimWorld 1.3 version. 1. Remove the "1000+ messages spam" function since it does not make too much sense and was reported buggy before. 2. Remove the human filth rate function due to the change of vanilla Rimworld code. 
v1.2.0.0 Upgraded for RimWorld 1.2 version. 1. Remove the "extending time on caravan maps" function since the relative code in vanilla game has been totally rewritten in RimWorld 1.2 . 2. Remove the onclick funciton on the broken heart at the bed assignment window since it will cause game crash. 3. Refine Chinese translation. Add Japanese traslation. 4. Other minor fixes and adjustments.
